Recommendations: 1. Once funds are available, air-conditioning facilities may be improved for hardworking faculty of the Mathematics department.
2. More chairs and tables may be proved for the Faculty Room.
3. Lockers may be provided for the faculty members.
4. Construction of cubicles at the Guidance Office is recommended if funds are available.
5. Labels of boxes containing the various materials for the different areas should be posted for the identification of areas and consequently save time for both accreditors and local task forces.
